query.name: contacts
query.jpql: select c from jokerhaccp$Contact c order by c.surname

query.name: preparationPrototypes
query.jpql: select c from jokerhaccp$Preparation_Prototype c order by c.name

query.name: products
query.jpql: select c from jokerhaccp$Product c order by c.name

query.name: suppliers
query.jpql: select c from jokerhaccp$Supplier c order by c.name
